EmailTemplate.name: Purell K-12 spiff sku's
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot and Purell team up to fight germs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Send the signal that you care with the Purell solution.
The PURELL brand shows parents, teachers and others that you care about cleanliness and the health and well-being of others. Now the brand that created hand sanitizer introduces a complete solution, with hand soap and surface disinfection products to more holistically fight the spread of germs. All scientifically formulated for no-trade-off protection. So you never have to choose between products that are effective and products people feel great about using.
